text: @NYGovCuomo Tell That To The Peaceful Protesters BLM and Antifa.  Sitting around watching the Mayor let the Coronavirus spread again though your City. Imported taking it back to their States. You Democrats are Power Crazies. Silent Majority will Raise Up. Will Fight You Every Step.
